import React from 'react' import './Home.css' import Carousel from 'react-bootstrap/Carousel'; import fst from '../Assets/fst.png' import sec from '../Assets/sec.png' import thrd from '../Assets/thrd.png' import frth from '../Assets/frth.png' import ffth from '../Assets/ffth.png' import { Link } from 'react-router-dom'; import Header from '../Components/Header' function Home() { return ( <>

For More Offers and Details Please Login
) } export default Home
